decline_advice:
If the company is registered overseas, you need to create an account for an overseas organisation.

If it's a UK company but does not have a company registration number, reapply for an account requesting access to the data for your own use.
decline_description: Company not found on Companies House
decline_detail: Your company name or number was not found on Companies House records.

decline_advice:
Reapply using the correct company name or number.

If the company is registered overseas, you need to create an account for an overseas organisation.
decline_description: Company Registration Number does not match the registration number on the Companies House website
decline_detail: Your company name and number do not match Companies House records.​​

decline_advice: Reapply for an account requesting access to the data for your own use.
decline_description: Company switchboard has no knowledge of applicant
decline_detail: We checked the details you gave, and we cannot verify your connection with the company,​

decline_advice:
If the charity is registered in the UK, reapply and enter the charity number.​

If you do not have a registered charity number, reapply for an account requesting access to the data for your own use.​
decline_description: Charity cannot be found on the CC website
decline_detail: Your charity could not be found on Charity Commission records.​​

decline_advice:
Reapply using the correct charity name and number​.

If you are an exempt charity or you cannot supply these details, reapply for an account requesting access to the data for your own use.​
decline_description: Charity Registration number​ does not match
decline_detail: Your charity name and charity number do not match the Charity Commission records.​​
